description:
Its been a long time since I've done one of these, but I think Romulus is a great example of a movie that could have been a whole lot better with a few simple writing tweaks. So join me for another episode of The Drinker Fixes. 

Get your Drinker and Doggo plushes now! https://www.makeship.com/products/the-critical-doggo-2-0-plushie
title: The Drinker Fixes... Alien: Romulus
